00045         const PopupMenu getMenuForIndex (int menuIndex, const String& menuName)
00046         {
00047                 DBG_SCOPE();
00048                 DBG_VAL(menuIndex);
00049                 DBG_VAL(menuName);
00050 
00051                 PopupMenu menu;
00052 
00053                 switch (menuIndex)
00054                 {
00055                         case 0:
00056                                 menu.addCommandItem(m_commandManager, about);
00057                                 break;
00058                         default:
00059                                 break;
00060                 }
00061                 return menu;
00062 
00063         }

00067         ApplicationCommandTarget* getNextCommandTarget()
00068         {
00069                 // this will return the next parent component that is an ApplicationCommandTarget (in this
00070                 // case, there probably isn't one, but it's best to use this method in your own apps).
00071                 return findFirstTargetParentComponent();
00072         }
00073         void getAllCommands (Array <CommandID>& commands)
00074         {
00075                 // this returns the set of all commands that this target can perform..
00076                 const CommandID ids[] = {
00077                         about
00078                 };
00079 
00080                 commands.addArray(ids, numElementsInArray(ids));
00081         }
00082         void getCommandInfo (const CommandID commandID, ApplicationCommandInfo& result)
00083         {
00084                 DBG_SCOPE();
00085                 DBG_VAL(commandID);
00086 
00087                 switch (commandID)
00088                 {
00089                         case about:
00090                                 result.setInfo(T("About MyJuceApp"), T("Displays information about MyJuceApp application"), T("Help"), 0);
00091                                 result.addDefaultKeypress(T('?'), ModifierKeys::commandModifier );
00092                                 break;
00093                         default:
00094                                 break;
00095                 }
00096 
00097         }
00098         bool perform (const InvocationInfo& info)
00099         {
00100                 bool result = true;
00101                 DBG_SCOPERET(bool, result);
00102                 DBG_INFO((T("Received Command %04x, flags=%d, method=%d"), info.commandID, info.commandFlags, info.invocationMethod));
00103 
00104                 switch(info.commandID)
00105                 {
00106                         case about:
00107                         {
00108                                 String title = T("MyJuceApp");
00109                                 title += T(" Version ");
00110                                 title += T("1.0.0");
00111                                 String message = T("Peter Vasil");
00112                                 message += T(". All rights reserved.");
00113                                 AlertWindow::showMessageBox(AlertWindow::InfoIcon, title, message, T("OK"));
00114                         }
00115                                 break;
00116                         default:
00117                                 result = false;
00118                                 break;
00119                 }
00120                 return result;
00121 
00122         }
